---
title: "WinterCereal"
doc_progress: 10

The APSIM WinterCereal model is designed for general winter cereal crops and constructed using the Plant Modelling Framework (PMF) [@brown_plant_2014].


## Phenology

The winter cereal [phenology](Phenology/index.qmd) is simulated from sowing to harvest.

## Traits

Some [Traits](Traits) are described in multiple components, which are summaried in the [Traits](Traits) section.
